parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

parameters.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

parameters.name: width

param_schema.title: Width
param_schema.description: Width of the generated image. Optional, only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16 (if it's not, it will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16)

parameters.description: Width of the generated image. Optional, only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16 (if it's not, it will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16)

parameters.name: height

param_schema.title: Height
param_schema.description: Height of the generated image. Optional, only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16 (if it's not, it will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16)

parameters.description: Height of the generated image. Optional, only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16 (if it's not, it will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16)

parameters.name: aspect_ratio

param_schema.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image. The size will always be 1 megapixel, i.e. 1024x1024 if aspect ratio is 1:1. To use arbitrary width and height, set aspect ratio to 'custom'.

parameters.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image. The size will always be 1 megapixel, i.e. 1024x1024 if aspect ratio is 1:1. To use arbitrary width and height, set aspect ratio to 'custom'.

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: Guidance scale for the diffusion process

parameters.description: Guidance scale for the diffusion process

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

parameters.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

parameters.name: disable_safety_checker

param_schema.title: Disable Safety Checker
param_schema.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)

parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the generated image. Optional, only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16 (if it's not, it will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16)

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the generated image. Optional, only used when aspect_ratio=custom. Must be a multiple of 16 (if it's not, it will be rounded to nearest multiple of 16)

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image. The size will always be 1 megapixel, i.e. 1024x1024 if aspect ratio is 1:1. To use arbitrary width and height, set aspect ratio to 'custom'.

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: Guidance scale for the diffusion process

output_quality.title: Output Quality
output_quality.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

disable_safety_checker.title: Disable Safety Checker
disable_safety_checker.description: Disable safety checker for generated images. This feature is only available through the API. See [https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety](https://replicate.com/docs/how-does-replicate-work#safety)
